nuthana waidya widyawen thawama soya no gath leda saha nirawaranaya wemin pawathina leda ganath budurajanan wahanse mita wasara 2600 kata kalin deshana kara thibenawa.samahara leda roga waidya widyawa anuwa nishchitha nigamanayakata eemata nohaki roga ganath unwahanse wadala.ee kamma wipaka walin hataganna roga aakarayata me sharirayata waladena leda roga layisthu gatha karala thiyenawa.
